input_text:
Job Title: IT Engineer,Applications,Intermediate

Location: Colorado Springs, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Keysight is on the forefront of technology innovation, delivering breakthroughs and trusted insights in electronic design, simulation, prototyping, test, manufacturing, and optimization. Our :15,000 employees create world-class solutions in communications, 5G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Learn more about what we do.

Our powerful, award-winning culture embraces a bold vision of where technology can take us and a passion for tackling challenging problems with industry-first solutions. Diversity, equity & inclusion are integral parts of our culture and drivers of innovation at Keysight. We believe that when people feel a sense of belonging, they can be more creative, innovative, and thrive at all points in their careers.

Responsibilities


Lead automation use case/playbook design sessions.Develop automation playbooks using either out-of-the-box (or custom) integrations and functions.Provives proficient scripting of network device changes using APIs.Look for oportunities to integrate automation into legacy, spreadsheet driven systems.Utilize scripting languages such as Bash and Python for automation creations.Provides assistance to cybersecurity staff to support cloud management and automation modifications using tools to automate repetitive tasks.Supports vulnerability management team with Jira sprint tasks and engages in infrastructure builds with a programmer's insight.


Qualifications


 Proficiency in writing and modifying SQL and Python code  Proficiency of using API based services and SDKs  Proficiency of Linux system Administration  Familiarity with Large Scale Networking and Subnetting  Experience in Vulnerability Management  Experience with Digital Vulnerability Scanning technologies  Experience with Power BI and working with large data sets 


Pay Range:

USD $72,830.00 - USD $121,380.00 Year

Careers Privacy Statement

***Keysight is an Equal Opportunity Employer.***

Keysight Technologies Inc. is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other protected categories under all applicable laws.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: IT Engineer, Applications, Intermediate
job_responsibilities: Lead automation use case/playbook design sessions.
Develop automation playbooks using either out-of-the-box (or custom) integrations and functions.
Provives proficient scripting of network device changes using APIs.
Look for opportunities to integrate automation into legacy, spreadsheet driven systems.
Utilize scripting languages such as Bash and Python for automation creations.
Provides assistance to cybersecurity staff to support cloud management and automation modifications using tools to automate repetitive tasks.
Supports vulnerability management team with Jira sprint tasks and engages in infrastructure builds with a programmer's insight.

Our :15,000 employees create world-class solutions in communications, 5G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Learn more about what we do.
